body_html:
That looks like an issue with how your local machine is set up, and not a tensorflow issue.

Here are some links that may be helpful:
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/24611640/curl-60-ssl-certificate-unable-to-get-local-issuer-certificate
https://www.google.com/search?q=curl%20ssl%20certificate%20problem

Hope that helps!
